author: Cliff Clasen
comment: Looks great on my LG R Watch but needs some customization options.  Would like to have an option to not show second hand in dim mode.  The second hand freezes is dim mode but should be removed all together.

reply.author: Mohammad Elzahaby
reply.content: thank you :) an update is comign soon which will make the seconds pointer disapear in the dim mode & make the hour & Minutes pointer more visible, and fix issues with moto 360

title: Clean and Simple
